recipes.title: Gut-Friendly Chicken Rice
recipes.description: Simple, soothing chicken and rice - perfect for sensitive stomachs
recipes.ingredients: 1 chicken breast, 1 cup white rice, 2 carrots, 1 zucchini, 1 tbsp olive oil, pinch of salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook rice according to package instructions
2. Grill chicken until cooked through
3. Steam carrots and zucchini until tender
4. Combine all ingredients and season with olive oil and salt

recipes.title: Low-FODMAP Smoothie
recipes.description: Gentle smoothie for breakfast or snack - easy to digest
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup spinach, 1/2 cup blueberries, 5 strawberries, 1/2 cup lactose-free yogurt, 1 tsp chia seeds
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients until smooth
2. Add ice if desired
3. Serve immediately for best nutrition

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad with Salmon
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 2 salmon fillets, 1 cucumber, 1 bell pepper, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook quinoa according to package and let cool
2. Bake salmon at 400°F for 12-15 mins
3. Chop vegetables into small pieces
4. Combine all ingredients with olive oil and lemon juice dressing

recipes.title: Gentle Oatmeal
recipes.description: Warm, soothing oatmeal for sensitive mornings
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup oats, 1 cup water, 1/2 banana, 1 tbsp maple syrup, pinch of cinnamon
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook oats with water according to package
2. Slice banana and add to oatmeal
3. Sweeten with maple syrup and sprinkle cinnamon
4. Serve warm for best comfort

recipes.title: Zucchini Noodles with Turkey
recipes.description: Light, low-carb meal that's gentle on digestion
recipes.ingredients: 2 zucchinis, 200g ground turkey, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Spiralize zucchinis into noodles
2. Brown turkey in pan with olive oil
3. Add cherry tomatoes and cook until soft
4. Toss with zucchini noodles and basil
5. Season with salt and serve immediately

recipes.title: Rice Cakes with Peanut Butter
recipes.description: Quick, safe snack for sensitive stomachs
recipes.ingredients: 2 rice cakes, 2 tbsp peanut butter (no additives), 1/2 banana, pinch of cinnamon
recipes.instructions:
1. Spread peanut butter on rice cakes
2. Slice banana and arrange on top
3. Sprinkle with cinnamon
4. Perfect for quick energy boost

recipes.title: Baked Fish with Roasted Potatoes
recipes.description: Simple, nutritious meal that's easy to digest
recipes.ingredients: 2 white fish fillets, 2 medium potatoes, 1 tbsp olive oil, lemon juice, dill, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube potatoes and roast at 400°F for 20 mins
2. Place fish fillets on baking sheet
3. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
4. Bake for 12-15 mins until fish flakes easily
5. Garnish with fresh dill

recipes.title: Spinach and Feta Omelette
recipes.description: Protein-rich breakfast that won't irritate your stomach
recipes.ingredients: 2 eggs, 1 cup spinach, 30g feta cheese, 1 tsp olive oil, pinch of salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Whisk eggs with salt
2. Sauté spinach in olive oil until wilted
3. Pour eggs over spinach, add crumbled feta
4. Cook until set, then fold and serve

recipes.title: Carrot Ginger Soup
recipes.ingredients: 4 carrots, 1 tbsp fresh ginger, 1 potato, 2 cups vegetable broth, 1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop carrots and potato
2. Sauté ginger in olive oil
3. Add vegetables and broth, simmer 20 mins
4. Blend until smooth and serve warm

recipes.title: Turkey and Rice Stuffed Peppers
recipes.ingredients: 2 bell peppers, 200g ground turkey, 1 cup cooked rice, 1 zucchini, 1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut peppers in half and remove seeds
2. Mix turkey, rice, and chopped zucchini
3. Stuff peppers with mixture
4. Bake at 375°F for 25-30 mins

recipes.title: Cucumber Tomato Salad
recipes.description: Refreshing salad perfect for hot days
recipes.ingredients: 1 cucumber, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, 1 tbsp olive oil, fresh mint, lemon juice, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice cucumber and halve tomatoes
2. Chop fresh mint
3. Combine all ingredients in bowl
4. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice

recipes.title: Baked Chicken with Sweet Potato
recipes.description: Hearty meal that's easy on digestion
recipes.ingredients: 2 chicken thighs, 1 sweet potato, 1 tbsp olive oil, rosemary, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube sweet potato
2. Place chicken and sweet potato on baking sheet
3. Drizzle with olive oil, add rosemary
4. Bake at 375°F for 30-35 mins

recipes.title: Berry Chia Pudding
recipes.ingredients: 3 tbsp chia seeds, 1 cup lactose-free milk, 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1 tsp maple syrup
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix chia seeds with milk and maple syrup
2. Refrigerate overnight
3. Top with fresh berries before serving
4. Perfect for busy mornings

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup cooked rice, 2 eggs, 1 carrot, 1 tbsp sesame oil, tamari sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Scramble eggs in pan
2. Add diced carrot and cook until tender
3. Add rice and stir fry
4. Season with sesame oil and tamari

recipes.title: Roasted Vegetable Medley
recipes.ingredients: 1 bell pepper, 1 zucchini, 1 carrot, 1 tbsp olive oil, herbs de provence, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop all vegetables into chunks
2. Toss with olive oil and herbs
3. Roast at 400°F for 20-25 mins
4. Serve as side dish or main

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipes.description: Layered breakfast that's gentle on stomach
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup lactose-free Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup blueberries, 2 tbsp gluten-free granola, 1 tsp honey
recipes.instructions:
1. Layer yogurt in glass
2. Add blueberries
3. Top with granola and drizzle honey
4. Serve immediately

recipes.title: Lentil and Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: Hearty soup packed with protein and fiber
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup red lentils, 1 carrot, 1 zucchini, 2 cups vegetable broth, 1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop vegetables
2. Sauté in olive oil until tender
3. Add lentils and broth, simmer 25 mins
4. Serve hot with crusty bread

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
recipes.description: Elegant meal that's easy to digest
recipes.ingredients: 2 salmon fillets, 1 bunch asparagus, 1 tbsp olive oil, lemon wedges, dill
recipes.instructions:
1. Trim asparagus ends
2. Place salmon and asparagus on baking sheet
3. Drizzle with olive oil
4. Bake at 400°F for 12-15 mins
5. Garnish with lemon and dill

recipes.title: Rice Pudding
recipes.description: Comforting dessert that's gentle on stomach
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup white rice, 2 cups lactose-free milk, 2 tbsp maple syrup, 1/2 tsp cinnamon
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook rice with milk until creamy
2. Sweeten with maple syrup
3. Sprinkle with cinnamon
4. Serve warm or chilled

recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach
recipes.ingredients: 2 eggs, 1 cup spinach, 1 tsp butter, pinch of salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Whisk eggs with salt
2. Sauté spinach until wilted
3. Add eggs and scramble
4. Serve immediately

recipes.title: Quinoa Bowl with Roasted Veggies
recipes.description: Nutrient-dense bowl for lunch or dinner
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 1 bell pepper, 1 zucchini, 1 carrot, 2 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook quinoa according to package
2. Chop and roast vegetables
3. Combine in bowl
4. Drizzle with olive oil

recipes.title: Chicken and Vegetable Skewers
recipes.description: Fun grilled meal perfect for summer
recipes.ingredients: 1 chicken breast, 1 bell pepper, 1 zucchini, 1 tbsp olive oil, herbs
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube chicken and vegetables
2. Thread onto skewers
3. Brush with olive oil and herbs
4. Grill for 10-12 mins

recipes.title: Apple Slices with Almond Butter
recipes.ingredients: 1 apple, 2 tbsp almond butter, pinch of cinnamon
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice apple
2. Spread almond butter on slices
3. Sprinkle with cinnamon
4. Enjoy immediately

recipes.title: Creamy Polenta with Mushrooms
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup polenta, 4 cups water, 1 cup mushrooms, 1 tbsp olive oil, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook polenta with water until creamy
2. Sauté mushrooms in olive oil
3. Serve polenta topped with mushrooms
4. Season with salt

recipes.title: Tuna Salad Lettuce Wraps
recipes.description: Light lunch that won't weigh you down
recipes.ingredients: 1 can tuna, 2 tbsp mayonnaise, 4 lettuce leaves, 1 cucumber, lemon juice
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix tuna with mayonnaise
2. Slice cucumber
3. Spoon tuna onto lettuce leaves
4. Top with cucumber and lemon juice

recipes.title: Baked Oatmeal Cups
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups oats, 2 eggs, 1 cup lactose-free milk, 1/2 cup blueberries, 2 tbsp maple syrup
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix all ingredients
2. Pour into muffin tin
3. Bake at 350°F for 25 mins
4. Store for quick breakfasts

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients: 1 bell pepper, 1 carrot, 1 zucchini, 1 tbsp sesame oil, tamari sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Julienne all vegetables
2. Heat sesame oil in wok
3. Stir fry vegetables until crisp-tender
4. Season with tamari sauce

recipes.title: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
recipes.ingredients: 1 banana, 1 cup lactose-free milk, 1 tbsp cocoa powder, 1 tsp maple syrup
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients until smooth
2. Add ice if desired
3. Serve immediately
4. Perfect chocolate fix

recipes.title: Herb Roasted Chicken
recipes.ingredients: 4 chicken thighs, 2 potatoes, 1 tbsp olive oil, rosemary, thyme, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube potatoes
2. Arrange chicken and potatoes in pan
3. Drizzle with oil and herbs
4. Roast at 375°F for 35-40 mins

recipes.title: Cottage Cheese with Peaches
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup cottage cheese, 1/2 peach, 1 tsp honey, pinch of cinnamon
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice peach
2. Top cottage cheese with peach slices
3. Drizzle with honey
4. Sprinkle cinnamon

recipes.title: Rice Paper Rolls
recipes.ingredients: 4 rice paper sheets, 1 carrot, 1 cucumber, 8 shrimp, mint leaves
recipes.instructions:
1. Julienne vegetables
2. Cook and peel shrimp
3. Soften rice paper in water
4. Fill and roll tightly

recipes.title: Pumpkin Soup
recipes.description: Creamy autumn soup that soothes digestion
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups pumpkin puree, 1 potato, 2 cups vegetable broth, 1 tbsp olive oil, nutmeg
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook potato until tender
2. Blend with pumpkin and broth
3. Heat with olive oil
4. Garnish with nutmeg

recipes.title: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients: 200g beef strips, 2 cups broccoli, 1 tbsp sesame oil, tamari sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Stir fry beef until browned
2. Add broccoli and cook until tender
3. Season with sesame oil and tamari
4. Serve over rice

recipes.title: Yogurt Bark
recipes.description: Frozen treat perfect for hot days
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups lactose-free yogurt, 1/2 cup blueberries, 2 tbsp maple syrup
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix yogurt with maple syrup
2. Spread on baking sheet
3. Top with blueberries
4. Freeze for 4 hours then break into pieces

recipes.title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 1 cucumber, 1 bell pepper, 2 tbsp olive oil, lemon juice, oregano
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook quinoa and let cool
2. Dice vegetables
3. Combine all ingredients
4. Dress with olive oil and lemon

recipes.title: Baked Egg Cups
recipes.description: Individual egg portions for easy breakfasts
recipes.ingredients: 4 eggs, 1/2 cup spinach, 30g feta cheese, 1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Whisk eggs
2. Chop spinach and crumble feta
3. Divide among muffin cups
4. Bake at 350°F for 15-18 mins

recipes.title: Lemon Herb Baked Cod
recipes.description: Light fish dish with bright flavors
recipes.ingredients: 2 cod fillets, 1 lemon, 1 tbsp olive oil, dill, parsley, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Place cod in baking dish
2. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
3. Sprinkle with herbs
4. Bake at 400°F for 12-15 mins

recipes.title: Trail Mix
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup almonds, 1/4 cup pumpkin seeds, 1/4 cup dark chocolate chips, 1/4 cup coconut flakes
recipes.instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients
2. Store in airtight container
3. Perfect for on-the-go snacking
4. Customize with your favorite nuts

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: Classic comfort soup for upset stomachs
recipes.ingredients: 1 chicken breast, 2 carrots, 1 zucchini, 4 cups chicken broth, rice noodles
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook chicken in broth until tender
2. Add chopped vegetables
3. Shred chicken and return to pot
4. Add rice noodles and cook until tender

recipes.title: Stuffed Sweet Potatoes
recipes.description: Hearty vegetarian meal packed with nutrients
recipes.ingredients: 2 sweet potatoes, 1 cup black beans, 1 bell pepper, 2 tbsp olive oil, cumin
recipes.instructions:
1. Bake sweet potatoes until tender
2. Sauté beans and peppers with cumin
3. Split potatoes and stuff with mixture
4. Drizzle with olive oil

recipes.title: Berry Compote
recipes.description: Sweet topping for yogurt or oatmeal
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup mixed berries, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp lemon juice
recipes.instructions:
1. Combine berries and maple syrup
2. Simmer until berries break down
3. Stir in lemon juice
4. Cool and store in jar

recipes.title: Breakfast Burrito Bowl
recipes.description: All the flavors of burrito without the wrap
recipes.ingredients: 2 eggs, 1/2 cup black beans, 1/4 avocado, 2 tbsp salsa, cilantro
recipes.instructions:
1. Scramble eggs
2. Heat beans
3. Layer in bowl with avocado and salsa
4. Garnish with cilantro

recipes.title: Cabbage Rolls
recipes.ingredients: 8 cabbage leaves, 200g ground turkey, 1 cup cooked rice, 2 cups tomato sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Blanch cabbage leaves
2. Mix turkey and rice
3. Roll mixture in cabbage leaves
4. Bake in tomato sauce for 30 mins

recipes.title: Chia Seed Jam
recipes.description: Healthy jam alternative with no added sugar
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup berries, 2 tbsp chia seeds, 1 tbsp maple syrup
recipes.instructions:
1. Mash berries
2. Mix with chia seeds and maple syrup
3. Let sit until thickened
4. Store in refrigerator

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi Zoodles
recipes.description: Elegant dish that's light on stomach
recipes.ingredients: 200g shrimp, 2 zucchinis, 2 tbsp olive oil, garlic-infused oil, lemon juice
recipes.instructions:
1. Spiralize zucchinis
2. Sauté shrimp in oils
3. Add zoodles and cook until tender
4. Finish with lemon juice

recipes.title: Protein Power Balls
recipes.description: No-bake energy bites for quick fuel
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup oats, 1/2 cup peanut butter, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 2 tbsp chia seeds
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix all ingredients
2. Roll into balls
3. Refrigerate until firm
4. Store in airtight container

recipes.title: Ratatouille
recipes.description: French vegetable stew that's naturally low FODMAP
recipes.ingredients: 1 eggplant, 1 zucchini, 1 bell pepper, 2 tomatoes, 2 tbsp olive oil, herbs
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice all vegetables
2. Layer in baking dish
3. Drizzle with olive oil and herbs
4. Bake at 375°F for 40 mins

recipes.title: Avocado Chocolate Mousse
recipes.ingredients: 1 avocado, 2 tbsp cocoa powder, 2 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp vanilla extract
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients until smooth
2. Chill for 1 hour
3. Serve cold
4. Top with berries if desired

recipes.title: Breakfast Sausage Patties
recipes.ingredients: 200g ground turkey, 1 tsp sage, 1/2 tsp thyme, 1/4 tsp black pepper, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix all ingredients
2. Form into patties
3. Cook in skillet until browned
4. Store for quick breakfasts

recipes.title: Cauliflower Rice Bowl
recipes.ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, 1 bell pepper, 1 carrot, 2 tbsp olive oil, tamari sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Rice cauliflower in food processor
2. Sauté with chopped vegetables
3. Season with tamari
4. Serve as base for proteins

recipes.title: Herbal Tea Blend
recipes.ingredients: 1 tsp peppermint leaves, 1 tsp chamomile flowers, 1 tsp ginger root, 2 cups water
recipes.instructions:
1. Combine herbs in tea infuser
2. Steep in hot water for 5 mins
3. Strain and enjoy
4. Perfect after meals

recipes.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
recipes.ingredients: 8 large mushrooms, 1/2 cup cooked quinoa, 2 tbsp olive oil, parsley, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Remove mushroom stems
2. Mix quinoa with oil and parsley
3. Stuff mushroom caps
4. Bake at 375°F for 20 mins

recipes.title: Coconut Curry Chicken
recipes.ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1 bell pepper, 1 cup coconut milk, 2 tbsp curry powder, 1 tbsp oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube chicken and pepper
2. Sauté in oil until browned
3. Add coconut milk and curry powder
4. Simmer 15 mins until chicken cooked

recipes.title: Zucchini Bread
recipes.description: Moist bread perfect for breakfast or snack
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups grated zucchini, 2 eggs, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 2 cups gluten-free flour, 1 tsp cinnamon
recipes.instructions:
1. Squeeze moisture from zucchini
2. Mix all ingredients
3. Bake at 350°F for 50-60 mins
4. Cool before slicing

recipes.title: Baked Apple Slices
recipes.ingredients: 2 apples, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tbsp coconut oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice apples
2. Toss with cinnamon and syrup
3. Bake at 375°F for 20 mins
4. Serve warm with yogurt

recipes.title: Turkey Meatballs
recipes.description: Lean protein option for various meals
recipes.ingredients: 400g ground turkey, 1 egg, 1/4 cup gluten-free breadcrumbs, 2 tbsp olive oil, herbs
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix all ingredients
2. Form into meatballs
3. Bake at 400°F for 20 mins
4. Serve with pasta or rice

recipes.title: Green Smoothie Bowl
recipes.ingredients: 1 banana, 1 cup spinach, 1/2 cup lactose-free yogurt, 2 tbsp gluten-free granola
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend banana, spinach and yogurt
2. Pour into bowl
3. Top with granola
4. Enjoy with spoon

recipes.title: Stir Fry Sauce
recipes.ingredients: 1/4 cup tamari, 2 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1 tsp ginger, 1 tbsp cornstarch
recipes.instructions:
1. Whisk all ingredients
2. Use immediately or store
3. Perfect for any stir fry
4. Adjust sweetness to taste

recipes.title: Breakfast Quinoa
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 2 cups water, 1/2 banana, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1/2 tsp cinnamon
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook quinoa with water
2. Mash banana and stir in
3. Sweeten with maple syrup
4. Sprinkle with cinnamon

recipes.title: Roasted Red Pepper Sauce
recipes.description: Versatile sauce for pasta, meats, or dipping
recipes.ingredients: 2 red bell peppers, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/4 cup lactose-free cream, salt, herbs
recipes.instructions:
1. Roast peppers until charred
2. Peel and blend with other ingredients
3. Heat gently if serving warm
4. Store in jar for up to 5 days

recipes.title: Chicken Satay Skewers
recipes.ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 2 tbsp peanut butter, 1 tbsp tamari, 1 tsp ginger, 1 tbsp lime juice
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube chicken and thread on skewers
2. Mix marinade ingredients
3. Marinate chicken 30 mins
4. Grill until cooked through

recipes.title: Pumpkin Spice Latte
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup lactose-free milk, 2 tbsp pumpkin puree, 1 tsp pumpkin spice, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1/2 cup coffee
recipes.instructions:
1. Heat milk with pumpkin and spices
2. Blend until frothy
3. Mix with coffee
4. Sweeten to taste

recipes.title: Balsamic Glazed Chicken
recipes.ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1/4 cup balsamic vinegar, 2 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Sear chicken in oil
2. Add vinegar and syrup
3. Simmer until glazed
4. Serve with roasted vegetables

recipes.title: Cinnamon Roasted Nuts
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups mixed nuts, 1 egg white, 2 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tbsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Whisk egg white until frothy
2. Toss nuts with egg white
3. Mix with syrup and spices
4. Bake at 300°F for 25 mins

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Middle Eastern eggs in tomato sauce
recipes.ingredients: 4 eggs, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1 bell pepper, 2 tbsp olive oil, paprika, cumin
recipes.instructions:
1. Sauté pepper in oil
2. Add tomato sauce and spices
3. Make wells and crack eggs into them
4. Cover and cook until eggs set

recipes.title: Almond Flour Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup almond flour, 2 eggs, 1/4 cup lactose-free milk, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp baking powder
recipes.instructions:
1. Whisk all ingredients
2. Cook on griddle until bubbles form
3. Flip and cook other side
4. Serve with berries and syrup

recipes.title: Vegetable Broth
recipes.description: Homemade broth for soups and cooking
recipes.ingredients: 2 carrots, 1 zucchini, 1 potato, 1 tbsp herbs, 8 cups water, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop vegetables
2. Simmer with water and herbs 2 hours
3. Strain and discard solids
4. Store in jars or freeze

recipes.title: Chocolate Covered Strawberries
recipes.ingredients: 10 strawberries, 1/2 cup dark chocolate chips, 1 tsp coconut oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Melt chocolate with oil
2. Dip strawberries in chocolate
3. Place on parchment paper
4. Refrigerate until set

recipes.title: Herb Crusted Pork Tenderloin
recipes.description: Elegant main course for special meals
recipes.ingredients: 1 pork tenderloin, 2 tbsp Dijon mustard, 1/4 cup gluten-free breadcrumbs, 2 tbsp herbs, 1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Rub pork with mustard
2. Press herb mixture onto pork
3. Roast at 400°F for 25-30 mins
4. Rest before slicing

recipes.title: Iced Herbal Tea
recipes.ingredients: 4 cups water, 4 peppermint tea bags, 1 tbsp maple syrup, lemon slices, ice
recipes.instructions:
1. Steep tea in hot water
2. Sweeten with maple syrup
3. Chill completely
4. Serve over ice with lemon

recipes.title: Breakfast Casserole
recipes.ingredients: 6 eggs, 1 cup lactose-free milk, 2 potatoes, 1 bell pepper, 200g turkey sausage, 1 tbsp oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube and roast potatoes
2. Sauté pepper and sausage
3. Layer in baking dish with eggs and milk
4. Bake at 375°F for 35-40 mins

recipes.title: Garlic Infused Oil
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup olive oil, 4 garlic cloves (whole, not crushed), glass jar
recipes.instructions:
1. Heat oil with whole garlic cloves
2. Simmer 10 mins (do not brown)
3. Remove garlic cloves
4. Store oil in jar for cooking

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1 head romaine, 2 tbsp Parmesan, 1/4 cup Caesar dressing (FODMAP-friendly), croutons (gluten-free)
recipes.instructions:
1. Grill chicken until cooked
2. Chop romaine
3. Slice chicken and arrange on lettuce
4. Top with dressing, Parmesan and croutons

recipes.title: Berry Sorbet
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups mixed berries, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1 tbsp lemon juice
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients until smooth
2. Freeze in container
3. Stir every 30 mins until frozen
4. Scoop and serve

recipes.title: Stir Fry Vegetable Noodles
recipes.ingredients: 2 zucchinis, 2 carrots, 1 bell pepper, 2 tbsp sesame oil, tamari sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Spiralize zucchini and carrots
2. Julienne bell pepper
3. Stir fry in sesame oil
4. Season with tamari

recipes.title: Homemade Nut Butter
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups almonds, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1/2 tsp salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Roast almonds 10 mins
2. Blend in food processor until creamy
3. Add syrup and salt
4. Store in jar

recipes.title: Breakfast Pizza
recipes.ingredients: 1 gluten-free pizza crust, 4 eggs, 1/2 cup spinach, 30g feta, 1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Pre-bake crust 5 mins
2. Scramble eggs with spinach
3. Spread on crust, top with feta
4. Bake 10 mins until set

recipes.title: Cucumber Mint Water
recipes.ingredients: 8 cups water, 1 cucumber, 10 mint leaves, ice
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice cucumber
2. Combine with water and mint
3. Refrigerate 2 hours
4. Serve over ice

recipes.title: Stuffed Acorn Squash
recipes.ingredients: 1 acorn squash, 200g ground turkey, 1/2 cup cooked quinoa, 2 tbsp olive oil, sage
recipes.instructions:
1. Halve and roast squash 30 mins
2. Cook turkey with quinoa and sage
3. Stuff squash with mixture
4. Bake 15 mins more

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups gluten-free flour, 1/2 cup maple syrup, 1/2 cup coconut oil, 1 egg, 1/2 cup dark chocolate chips
recipes.instructions:
1. Cream oil and syrup
2. Mix in egg and flour
3. Stir in chocolate chips
4. Bake at 350°F for 10-12 mins

recipes.title: Breakfast Sausage Gravy
recipes.ingredients: 200g turkey sausage, 2 tbsp gluten-free flour, 2 cups lactose-free milk, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions:
1. Brown sausage in pan
2. Sprinkle with flour
3. Gradually add milk while stirring
4. Simmer until thickened

recipes.title: Roasted Beet Salad
recipes.ingredients: 2 beets, 4 cups mixed greens, 2 tbsp walnuts, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar
recipes.instructions:
1. Roast beets until tender
2. Peel and slice
3. Arrange on greens with walnuts
4. Dress with oil and vinegar

recipes.title: Energy Bites
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup oats, 1/2 cup almond butter, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1/4 cup dark chocolate chips, 2 tbsp chia seeds
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix all ingredients
2. Roll into balls
3. Refrigerate until firm
4. Store in airtight container

recipes.title: Breakfast Tacos
recipes.ingredients: 4 corn tortillas, 4 eggs, 1/2 avocado, 2 tbsp salsa, cilantro
recipes.instructions:
1. Scramble eggs
2. Warm tortillas
3. Fill with eggs and toppings
4. Garnish with cilantro

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Soup
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups tomato puree, 1/2 cup lactose-free cream, 1 tbsp olive oil, basil, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Heat tomato puree
2. Stir in cream
3. Drizzle with olive oil
4. Garnish with fresh basil

recipes.title: Grilled Vegetable Platter
recipes.ingredients: 1 eggplant, 2 zucchinis, 2 bell peppers, 1/4 cup olive oil, herbs, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice vegetables
2. Brush with oil and herbs
3. Grill until tender
4. Arrange on platter

recipes.title: Fruit Salad with Mint
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup strawberries, 1 cup blueberries, 1 orange, 10 mint leaves, 1 tbsp maple syrup
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop all fruit
2. Tear mint leaves
3. Combine all ingredients
4. Chill before serving

recipes.title: Breakfast Hash
recipes.ingredients: 2 potatoes, 1 bell pepper, 4 eggs, 200g turkey sausage, 2 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube and roast potatoes
2. Sauté pepper and sausage
3. Add potatoes to skillet
4. Make wells and crack eggs, cover until set

recipes.title: Chocolate Avocado Pudding
recipes.ingredients: 1 avocado, 2 tbsp cocoa powder, 3 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp vanilla extract
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients until smooth
2. Chill 1 hour
3. Serve cold
4. Top with berries if desired

recipes.title: Herb Roasted Turkey Breast
recipes.description: Lean protein for meals throughout week
recipes.ingredients: 1 turkey breast, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp rosemary, 1 tbsp thyme, 1 tsp sage, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Rub turkey with oil and herbs
2. Roast at 375°F until internal 165°F
3. Rest before slicing
4. Use for sandwiches, salads, etc.

recipes.title: Cinnamon Apple Chips
recipes.ingredients: 2 apples, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tbsp maple syrup
recipes.instructions:
1. Thinly slice apples
2. Toss with cinnamon and syrup
3. Bake at 225°F for 2 hours
4. Cool until crispy

recipes.title: Breakfast Quesadillas
recipes.ingredients: 4 corn tortillas, 4 eggs, 1/2 cup black beans, 1/4 avocado, 2 tbsp salsa
recipes.instructions:
1. Scramble eggs
2. Warm tortillas
3. Fill with eggs, beans, avocado
4. Cook until golden brown

recipes.title: Creamy Polenta
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup polenta, 4 cups water, 1/2 cup lactose-free cream, 2 tbsp butter, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Bring water to boil
2. Whisk in polenta
3. Simmer 25 mins, stirring often
4. Stir in cream and butter

recipes.title: Trail Mix Cookies
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups gluten-free flour, 1/2 cup maple syrup, 1/2 cup coconut oil, 1 egg, 1/2 cup trail mix
recipes.instructions:
1. Cream oil and syrup
2. Mix in egg and flour
3. Stir in trail mix
4. Bake at 350°F for 10-12 mins

recipes.title: Breakfast Burritos
recipes.ingredients: 4 gluten-free tortillas, 6 eggs, 1/2 cup black beans, 1/4 cup salsa, 1/2 avocado
recipes.instructions:
1. Scramble eggs
2. Warm tortillas
3. Fill with eggs, beans, avocado, salsa
4. Roll tightly and wrap

recipes.title: Roasted Root Vegetables
recipes.ingredients: 2 carrots, 2 parsnips, 1 sweet potato, 2 tbsp olive oil, rosemary, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube all vegetables
2. Toss with oil and rosemary
3. Roast at 400°F for 30-35 mins
4. Serve as side dish

recipes.title: Chocolate Banana Nice Cream
recipes.ingredients: 2 frozen bananas, 2 tbsp cocoa powder, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp vanilla extract
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients until smooth
2. Serve immediately
3. Or freeze for firmer texture
4. Top with berries if desired

recipes.title: Herb Marinated Chicken
recipes.ingredients: 4 chicken breasts, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 2 tbsp herbs, 1 tsp salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix marinade ingredients
2. Marinate chicken 2-24 hours
3. Grill or bake until cooked
4. Use in salads, sandwiches, etc.

recipes.title: Berry Smoothie Bowl
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup mixed berries, 1/2 banana, 1/2 cup lactose-free yogurt, 2 tbsp gluten-free granola
recipes.instructions:
1. Blend berries, banana and yogurt
2. Pour into bowl
3. Top with granola
4. Enjoy with spoon

recipes.title: Breakfast Sausage
recipes.ingredients: 400g ground turkey, 1 tsp sage, 1/2 tsp thyme, 1/4 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix all ingredients
2. Form into patties or links
3. Cook in skillet until browned
4. Store for quick breakfasts

recipes.title: Creamy Mushroom Soup
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups mushrooms, 1 potato, 2 cups vegetable broth, 1/2 cup lactose-free cream, 2 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Sauté mushrooms in oil
2. Add potato and broth, simmer 20 mins
3. Blend until smooth
4. Stir in cream and heat gently

recipes.title: Trail Mix Bars
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup oats, 1/2 cup almond butter, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1/4 cup trail mix, 2 tbsp chia seeds
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix all ingredients
2. Press into pan
3. Refrigerate until firm
4. Cut into bars

recipes.title: Breakfast Strata
recipes.ingredients: 4 slices gluten-free bread, 6 eggs, 2 cups lactose-free milk, 1 bell pepper, 200g turkey sausage, 1 cup spinach
recipes.instructions:
1. Cube bread and layer in dish
2. Sauté pepper, sausage, spinach
3. Layer over bread
4. Pour egg mixture over, bake 45 mins

recipes.title: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
recipes.ingredients: 4 potatoes, 2 tbsp garlic-infused oil, 1/2 cup lactose-free cream, 2 tbsp butter, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil potatoes until tender
2. Mash with oil, cream, butter
3. Season with salt
4. Serve warm

recipes.title: Chocolate Covered Banana Bites
recipes.ingredients: 2 bananas, 1/2 cup dark chocolate chips, 1 tsp coconut oil
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice bananas
2. Melt chocolate with oil
3. Dip banana slices
4. Freeze on parchment paper

recipes.title: Herb Roasted Chicken Thighs
recipes.ingredients: 4 chicken thighs, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp rosemary, 1 tbsp thyme, 1 tsp sage, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Rub chicken with oil and herbs
2. Roast at 400°F for 30-35 mins
3. Rest before serving
4. Serve with roasted vegetables

recipes.title: Berry Parfait
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups lactose-free yogurt, 1 cup mixed berries, 1/4 cup gluten-free granola, 2 tbsp maple syrup
recipes.instructions:
1. Layer yogurt in glasses
2. Add berries
3. Top with granola
4. Drizzle with maple syrup

recipes.title: Breakfast Sandwiches
recipes.ingredients: 4 gluten-free English muffins, 4 eggs, 4 turkey sausage patties, 4 slices cheese (lactose-free)
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook eggs and sausage
2. Toast English muffins
3. Assemble sandwiches
4. Wrap for on-the-go

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups tomato puree, 1/2 cup lactose-free cream, 1/4 cup fresh basil, 2 tbsp olive oil, salt
recipes.instructions:
1. Heat tomato puree
2. Stir in cream
3. Chop basil and stir in
4. Drizzle with olive oil

recipes.title: Trail Mix
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup almonds, 1/4 cup pumpkin seeds, 1/4 cup dark chocolate chips, 1/4 cup coconut flakes
recipes.instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients
2. Store in airtight container
3. Perfect for on-the-go
4. Customize with favorite nuts
